oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Raymond Pedigo of the ASCS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Clement, William L., photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Raymond Pedigo, ASCS Office Manager, in field of orchardgrass planned for renovation by discing and seeding red clover and lespedeza. Located three miles south of Auburntown.

One in a series of photographs of agricultural activities in Cannon County, TN that were taken by W.L. Clement, District Conservationist for the U.S. Soil Conservation Service, and his assistants between the mid-1940s and mid-1970s.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photographs of W.L. Clement, U.S. Soil Conservation Service
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States. Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service; Grasses
Photographic prints; Farms
Orchardgrass;
